### Sample Code to Generate 2D BM and plot

Let's set up some variables.

```{r}
library("MoBrownie");
set.seed(123);
delta  = 1/32;
t.seq  = seq(1,100, delta);  
sigma2 = 0.001;
```

Now calling the bm function

```{r}
x.t = get.bm(t.seq, sigma2 = sigma2);
y.t = get.bm(t.seq, sigma2 = sigma2);
```

The output is:

```{r}
plot.bm(x.t, y.t);
```
